summary: The diff shows preliminary integration work in `frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts` for “Christian stations” (new in-memory state and cache reset handling). However, the provided diff is truncated before any fetch/merge logic, so key REQ-4/5/6 acceptance criteria cannot be confirmed from the available evidence.

missing_requirements.requirement: Fetch additional radio stations from the Radio Browser endpoint for tag "christian" and merge them into the app’s existing global station list without removing or altering any previously available stations; filter to languages including "hindi" or "english" (case-insensitive).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff excerpt adds Christian-station state (`christianStationsFetched`, `christianStationsCache`) but does not show any implemented network request to the Radio Browser tag feed, language filtering, UUID deduplication, or merge into the global station list. Because `useQueries.ts` is truncated, these behaviors cannot be verified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement resilient fetching for the Christian-tag station feed using the same server failover approach as existing global station fetch; apply the same station validity checks (prefer url_resolved, fallback to url; ensure no runtime errors for coordinate-dependent components).
missing_requirements.reason: No visible code in the truncated excerpt demonstrates multi-server failover for the Christian-tag endpoint or the validity checks for stream URL/coordinates being applied to the Christian-tag results before merging.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the merged station list is cached consistently with the existing multi-layer caching approach so Christian-tag stations persist across reloads and after refresh, without other UI changes.
missing_requirements.reason: While `clearAllCaches()` now resets Christian-related in-memory state, the excerpt does not show Christian stations being persisted to IndexedDB/localStorage alongside existing caching, nor that refresh/refetch results in a merged cached list including Christian-tag stations.
